text: "Regulate" is a hip hop song performed by Nate Dogg and Warren G. The song was released in the summer of 1994. It appears on the soundtrack of Above the Rim, and later Regulate... G Funk Era. The song reached #2 on the Billboard Hot 100. It also hit #8 on the R&B;/Hip Hop chart. The song samples "I Keep Forgettin' (Every Time You're Near)" by Michael McDonald. This is the song that made Warren G famous and became one of his biggest hits. Until then, he was mostly known for being a good friend of and being mentioned with Snoop Dogg and Nate Dogg. The song uses a sample from Michael McDonald's classic I Keep Forgettinâ€™. ==References== Category:Hip hop songs Category:Hip hop soul songs Category:1994 songs
title: Regulate (song)
